name: Does The Chimney Creak?
description:
A short horror survival game about keeping the fireplace lit to keep out a ghost chimney sweep. The game can be fully completed in about 10-20 minutes. 

To keep the fire lit the player must navigate the house to find candles. Then bring the candles to the fire to keep it lit. All while avoiding the ghost. Th player must survive until 6 am. 

Please share and consider leaving a comment or rating.
